description:
Odin reveals his role in Kenichi`s past, and fond memories are shared - but the First Fist promises the future won`t be as pleasant.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das gelobte Land! Wo alles begann
The Place the Promise Was Made! Everything Started Here!
Yakusoku no Chi! Subete wa Koko kara
約束の地! すべてはここから
